channel.title: Server!
channel.description: hi im new to moparscape forums, im wanting to make a 508 server and im wanting it perfect! can any one help me? i need the best team i can get and i will pay!!add me on tomnixon145@msn.com only people that are very good at making servers !! thanks. also message me on here aswel

item.title: Server!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

ajin dynasty:

been trying to have a look but it looks so hard :S would be good if some one could skype me + team view

If you’re not going to put any effort into this, then don’t even bother.

Read full topic

item.title: Server!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

ajin dynasty:

well im new to making private servers i have played alot of them… but i have decided im wanting to make my own and make it crazy good! just need to know how to do it? thanks.

Paying someone to do your work isn’t cool, bro.

a) It’s a waste of money.
b) You don’t learn anything from it.

There are many, many tutorials on how to start your own server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Welcome to the forums!

Paying isn’t allowed.

You may recruit people to help you in the development section, but my question is, what will you do (besides run it)?

Read full topic
